text: Iadɨ 10.1 CV 13.21-22, 14.21-29, Nam 9.18, Neh 9.12, Sng 78.13 isagali imahali me namɨlaŋ igahɨlɨhalaŋ uami. Mosesɨ hɨniadami hadɨhu avɨli susu agaŋ hɨbɨ hali uu aludɨ iamɨlɨhali agɨlasaŋ hɨbɨ abalamɨdaci iga iga nudɨ sɨvɨ uavɨmi uami. Uavɨla ahuata hameŋ Letɨsi avɨli hekɨlɨ agadɨ limu heŋ ivouavɨmi uami.
